verses.name: Acts 19:32
verses.text: Some therefore cried one thing, and some another: for the assembly was confused; and the more part knew not wherefore they were come together.

verses.name: Acts 19:33
verses.text: And they drew Alexander out of the multitude, the Jews putting him forward. And Alexander beckoned with the hand, and would have made his defence unto the people.

verses.name: Acts 19:34
verses.text: But when they knew that he was a Jew, all with one voice about the space of two hours cried out, Great is Diana of the Ephesians.
